text: Avdakt () is a Russian Christian male first name.Superanskaya, p. 31 It is possibly derived from the Serbian Muslim word Abdaga (Abdul-aga), meaning master's slave, slave of an elder relative. Its colloquial form is Avda (). "Avdakt" is also a colloquial form of the male first name Adavkt. ==References== ===Notes=== ===Sources=== *А. В. Суперанская (A. V. Superanskaya). "Словарь русских имён" (Dictionary of Russian Names). Издательство Эксмо. Москва, 2005.
title: Avdakt
